name: 2024 snowflake
notes:
this is a quick crochet snowflake that can be hung on a christmas tree as an ornament, or hung in a window as a winter decoration.

notes: 
* i used a 3.125mm hook
* i used lion brand 24/7 cotton in color
  white.  this seems to be thinner than
  dk weight yarn.  it also seems to be thinner than
  other skeins of the same yarn in a
  different color.
